generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with white pedestrian crossing stripes and a red van driving on it.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated by curbs and bordered by vegetation and buildings.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible, including modern glass-fronted structures and other urban buildings along the street.
- vegetation: There are trees and bushes with green leaves and some flowering plants visible in the middle of the road and along the sidewalks.

- sky: The sky is visible in the background, appearing overcast with some clouds, and some electrical wires are also visible against it.
- person: A person can be seen sitting on a bench on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.

- motorcycle: A motorcycle can be seen in the distance, parked on the left side of the road.
